description: Grants permission to update an existing case.

parameters.name: caseId
parameters.description: Required element for UpdateCase to identify the case ID for updates.

parameters.name: watchersToAdd
parameters.description: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to add additional watchers to a case. (dict) --- name (string) --- jobTitle (string) ---

parameters.name: watchersToDelete
parameters.description: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to remove existing watchers from a case. (dict) --- name (string) --- jobTitle (string) ---

parameters.name: threatActorIpAddressesToAdd
parameters.description: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to add additional suspicious IP addresses related to a case. (dict) --- userAgent (string) ---

parameters.name: threatActorIpAddressesToDelete
parameters.description: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to remove suspicious IP addresses from a case. (dict) --- userAgent (string) ---

parameters.name: impactedServicesToAdd
parameters.description: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to add services impacted. (string) ---

parameters.name: impactedServicesToDelete
parameters.description: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to remove services impacted. (string) ---

parameters.name: impactedAwsRegionsToAdd
parameters.description: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to add regions impacted. (dict) ---

parameters.name: impactedAwsRegionsToDelete
parameters.description: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to remove regions impacted. (dict) ---

parameters.name: impactedAccountsToAdd
parameters.description: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to add accounts impacted. (string) ---

parameters.name: impactedAccountsToDelete
parameters.description: Optional element for UpdateCase to provide content to add accounts impacted. (string) ---
